Senses: Passive Perception 10
Languages: Any one

Bramble Heart: The Berserker has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Reckless: At the start of its turn, the berserker can gain advantage on all melee attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

Actions

Battleaxe: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 1d8+4 slashing damage.

Cult Fanatic Sorcerer

Լ

CR2 (450 XP), Medium humanoid (half-elf), Evil

Armor Class: 12
Hit Points: 33 (6d8)+6
Speed: 30ft

STR
11 (+0)

DEX
14 (+2)

CON
12 (+1)

INT
10 (+0)

WIS
13 (+1)

CHA
14 (+2)

Skills: Deception +4, Persuation +4, Arcana +2
Senses: passive perception 10
Languages: Arkanian, Ayranic, Sorieli

Heirs of Nendor: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Spellcasting: The fanatic is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spell casting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The fanatic has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): Fire Bolt (does lightning damage), Mage Hand, Shape Water, Prestidigitation
1st level (3 slots): Silvery Barbs, Frost Fingers (does lightning damage), Thunderwave

Lightning Adept: The fanatic's spells ignore resistance to lightning damage. When dealing lightning damage, it treats any 1 rolled on the dmage dice as a 2.

Actions

Multiattack: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.

Dagger: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft or range 20/60ft, one creature.
Hit: 1d4+2 piercing damage.

Bonus Actions

Tempestuous Magic: Immediately before or after casting a 1st-level spell, the fanatic flies up to 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

Rose Concubine

Լ

CR¼ (50 XP), Medium humanoid (elf), Neutral

Armor Class: 10
Hit Points: 9 (2d8)
Speed: 30ft

STR
10 (+0)

DEX
10 (+0)

CON
10 (+0)

INT
11 (+0)

WIS
10 (+0)

CHA
14 (+2)

Skills: Insight +2, Persuation +4
Senses: Passive perception 10
Languages: Nendorian, Sylvan, and up to one more language

Spellcasting: The concubine is a 1st-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). She knows the following spells:

Cantrips (at will): Thorn Whip, Druidcraft, Mending
1st level (2 slots): Charm Person, Entangle, Goodberry

Born of Mana: The concubine feels a slight tingle at the presence of magic in her vicinity. She immediately knows if something magical is within 30ft of her, whether a creature, spell, or magic item. She doesn't know the nature of the magic (for instance, she can't discern whether the magic is a creature with an active magic effect or a spell such as Snare) without looking at it, only that it exists, and the very rough direction of it's location. If a creature in this radius casts a spell, she immediately notices the surge in magic, even if she can't see the caster. She also knows if the magic is approaching her or not by way a faint increase in the tingling as it gets closer. An overwhelming magical presence (a monster of CR14 or higher that isn't a beast, humanoid, or monstrosity that's incapable of casting spells, a character that can cast spells of 8th level or higher, or an artifact) registers as suffocating rather than tingly. If such a creature would attempt to frighten her with a spell or ability, she can never have advantage on the save.

Heirs of Nendor: The concubine has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or magically put to sleep

Roseblood: The concubine's blood is very fragrant. A creature who smells it for the first time every 24 hours must succeed on a DC10 Charisma saving throw to resist the allure of the Rose Queen.

Rose Courtesan

Լ

CR6 (2300 XP), Medium fey humanoid (elf), Chaotic Neutral

Armor Class: 15 (natural armor)
Hit Points: 61 (11d10)
Speed: 30ft.

STR
11 (+0)

DEX
14 (+2)

CON
11 (+0)

INT
14 (+2)

WIS
15 (+2)

CHA
18 (+4)

Saving Throws:Wis +6, Cha +8
Skills: Insight +6, Medicine +6, Nature +6, Persuation +8
Senses: Passive Perception 12
Languages: Sylvan, Nendorian, and up to one more language

Born of Mana: The courtesan feels a slight tingle at the presence of magic in her vicinity. She immediately knows if something magical is within 30ft of her, whether a creature, spell, or magic item. She doesn't know the nature of the magic (for instance, she can't discern whether the magic is a creature with an active magic effect or a spell such as Snare) without looking at it, only that it exists, and the very rough direction of it's location. If a creature in this radius casts a spell, she immediately notices the surge in magic, even if she can't see the caster. She also knows if the magic is approaching her or not by way a faint increase in the tingling as it gets closer. An overwhelming magical presence (a monster of CR14 or higher that isn't a beast, humanoid, or monstrosity that's incapable of casting spells, a character that can cast spells of 8th level or higher, or an artifact) registers as suffocating rather than tingly. If such a creature would attempt to frighten her with a spell or ability, she can never have advantage on the save.

Rosewalk: As part of her movement, the courtesan can enter any medium or larger rose plant, then emerge from another one within 300ft.

Roseblood: The courtesan's blood is very fragrant. A creature who smells it for the first time every 24 hours must succeed on a DC10 Charisma saving throw to resist the allure of the Rose Queen.

Heirs of Nendor: The courtesan has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or magically put to sleep

Spellcasting: The courtesan is a 9th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16 , +8 to hit with spell attacks). She ignores lesser materials as though she had a spell focus. She knows the following spells:

Cantrips (at will): Blade Ward, Druidcraft, Mending, Thorn Whip
1st level (4 slots): Charm Person, Cure Wounds, Entangle, Goodberry
2nd level (3 slots): Hold Person, Invisibility, Misty Step, Suggestion
3rd level (3 slots): Dispel Magic, Plant Growth, Speak with Plants, Spirit Guardians
4th level (3 slots): Charm Monster, Conjure Woodland Beings, Dominate Beast
5th level (2 slots): Awaken, Dominate Person, Wrath of Nature

Actions

Multimagic: The courtesan casts two cantrips of her choice.

Slam: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage.

Reactions

Dazzling Smile: The courtesan smiles sweetly at a creature she can see within 30ft. that is attacking her. That creature must succeed on a DC15 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by her until the start of its next turn.

Rose Dragon Wyrmling

Լ

CR3 (700 XP), Medium fey dragon, Neutral

Armor Class: 17 (natural armor)
Hit Points: 52 (8d8+16)
Speed: 30ft, fly 60ft.

STR
17 (+3)

DEX
14 (+2)

CON
14 (+2)

INT
12 (+1)

WIS
11 (+0)

CHA
16 (+3)

Saving Throws: Dex +4, Con +4, Wis +2, Cha +5
Skills: Perception +4, Stealth +4
Condition Immunities: Charmed
Senses: Blindsight 10ft, Darkvision 60ft, passive Perception 14
Languages: Sylvan

Rosewalk: As part of its movement, the wyrmling can enter any medium or larger rose plant, then emerge from another one within 300ft.

Roseblood: The wyrmling's blood is very fragrant. A creature who smells it for the first time every 24 hours must succeed on a DC10 Charisma saving throw to resist the allure of the Rose Queen.

Actions

Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 5ft, one target.
Hit: 2d8+3 piercing damage

Psychedelic Breath (Recharge 5-6): The wyrmling exhales a sparkling mist in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC13 Wisdom save or take 4d10 psychic damage. A creature that fails this saving throw must also roll on the table below and be affected by the result until the wyrmling's next turn. A character reduced to 0 hit points by this breath is stable. However, that character wakes affected by short-term madness.

d10 Condition
1 Stunned
2-4 Charmed by the wyrmling
5-7 Frightened by the wyrmling
8-9 Blinded
10 Invisible

Rose Queen's Handmaiden

Լ

CR9 (5000 XP), Large fey, Chaotic Neutral

Armor Class: 15 (natural armor)
Hit Points: 124 (19d10+19)
Speed: 40ft.

STR
15 (+2)

DEX
14 (+2)

CON
13 (+1)

INT
14 (+2)

WIS
19 (+4)

CHA
20 (+5)

Saving Throws: Con +5, Wis +8, Cha +9
Skills: Insight +8, Medicine +8, Nature +6, Persuation +9
Senses: Darkvision 60ft., passive Perception 14
Languages: Sylvan, Nendorian, and up to one more language

Rosewalk: As part of her movement, the handmaiden can enter any large or larger rose plant, then emerge from another one within 300ft.

Roseblood: The handmaiden's blood is very fragrant. A creature who smells it for the first time every 24 hours must succeed on a DC10 Charisma saving throw to resist the allure of the Rose Queen.

Fey Insight: The handmaiden has advantage on saving throws against being magically frightened or charmed, as well as to see through illusions.

Spellcasting: The handmaiden is a 12th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17 , +9 to hit with spell attacks). She ignores lesser materials as though she had a spell focus. She knows the following spells:

Cantrips (at will): Blade Ward, Druidcraft, Mending, Thorn Whip
1st level (4 slots): Charm Person, Cure Wounds, Entangle, Goodberry
2nd level (3 slots): Hold Person, Invisibility, Misty Step, Suggestion
3rd level (3 slots): Dispel Magic, Plant Growth, Speak with Plants, Spirit Guardians
4th level (3 slots): Charm Monster, Conjure Woodland Beings, Dominate Beast
5th level (2 slots): Awaken, Dominate Person, Wrath of Nature
6th level (1 slot): Sunbeam, Wall of Thorns

Actions

Multimagic: The handmaiden casts two cantrips of her choice.

Slam: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
Hit: 1d6+2 bludgeoning damage.

Reactions

Dazzling Smile: The handmaiden smiles sweetly at a creature she can see within 30ft. that is attacking her. That creature must succeed on a DC15 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by her until the start of its next turn.

Warlock of the Rose

CR4 (1100 XP), Medium humanoid (human), Neutral

Armor Class: 11 (14 /w Mage Armor)
Hit Points: 49 (11d8)
Speed: 30ft

STR
9 (-1)

DEX
13 (+1)

CON
11 (+0)

INT
11 (+0)

WIS
12 (+1)

CHA
18 (+4)

Saving Throws: Wis +3, Cha +6
Skills: Arcana +2, Deception +6, Nature +2, Persuasion +6
Condition Immunities: Charmed
Senses: Passive perception 11
Languages: Any two

Innate Spellcasting: The warlock's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 15), requiring no material components:

At will: Disguise, Mage Armor (self only), Silent Image, Speak With Animals
1/day: Mental Prison

Spellcasting: The warlock is a 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

Cantrips (at will): Dancing Lights, Thorn Whip (3d6), Friends, Mage Hand, Minor Illusion, Prestidigitation, Vicious Mockery (3d4)
1st-5th level (3 5th-level slots): Blink, Charm Person, Hail of Thorns, Dominate Beast, Faerie Fire, Hold Monster, Misty Step, Phantasmal Force, Seeming, Sleep

Actions

Dagger: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5ft or range 20/60ft, one target.
Hit: 1d4+2 piercing damage

Reactions

Beguiling Defenses: In response to another creature attempting to charm the warlock, the warlock attempts to charm that creature. The creature must succeed on a DC14 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by the warlock for 1 minute, or until it takes damage.

Misty Escape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest): In response to taking damage, the warlock turns invisible and teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It remains invisible until the start of its next turn or until it attacks, makes a damage roll, or casts a spell.

Hit Points: 32 (5d8+10)
Speed: 30ft

INT

CHA
11 (+0)

Skill: Intimidation +2
Senses: Passive perception 10
Languages: Any one language (usually Common)

Cunning Action: The goon can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action.

Actions:

Combat Knife: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft, one creature.
Hit: 1d4+2 bludgeoning damage.

Pistol: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400ft, reload (6 shots) one target.
Hit: 1d10+2 piercing damage.

Legendary Actions

The --- can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The --- regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Action: kun kiitara soi ei itkeä saa

Action: kun kiitara soi ei itkeä saa

regional effects intro

If dies, these regional effects end immediately.

Lair Actions

On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the --- takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects. The --- can't use the same effect two rounds in a row.
